setting_group_forum_system: <title>Forum System</title><info>Settings for the Forum System mod</info>
setting_icon: <title>Icon Color</title><info>Select the color for the forum icon:blue, green, red, violet</info>
setting_showthreads: <title>Show/Hide Threads</title><info>This option will allow you to show a collapsed window with the Threads.</info>
setting_threads_number: <title>Number of Threads</title><info>Select the number of threads to show</info>
setting_posts_number: <title>Number of Posts</title><info>Select the number of posts to show</info>
setting_forums_number: <title>Number of Forums</title><info>Select the number of forums to show</info>
setting_newposts: <title>Show new Posts Tag</title><info>Select this option to give notice of the new posts</info>
setting_show_categories: <title>Show Category Forums</title><info>Select this option to show a combobox with the category forums</info>
setting_showpost: <title>Show/Hide Posts</title><info>This option will allow you to show a collapsed window with the Posts.</info>
setting_showposts: <title>Show/Hide Posts</title><info>This option will allow you to show a collapsed window with the Posts.</info>
setting_tag_color:
<title>New Posts Tag Color</title><info>Select the color for the "new posts" tag.

You can type the name of the color (ex: red, yellow, blue, darkblue...) or you can type the RGB code of the color (ex:#ffee00)</info>
setting_char:
<title>Number of Chars in Posts</title><info>Select the number of characters to show in posts.

Select 0 to show all characters.
</info>
setting_attach: <title>Show Attach Files</title><info>This option will allow you to show the attach files on posts.</info>
setting_thank: <title>Show Thanks</title><info>Select this option to show the Thank button and the list of members that have thanked the post.</info>
setting_group_number: <title>Number of Pages</title><info>Select the number of pages to show</info>
